comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: Miss Frances S. Peck Weds Vivian H. Egleston Miss Frances Staunton Peck, the daughter of Staunton Bloodgood Peck (b.1864) of Philadelphia, and Mr. Vivian H. Egleston, the son of George W. Egleston, were married on June 1, 1915, in New York City. [1] Miss Peck was the granddaughter of Mrs. Thomas B. (Bloodgood) Peck, Sr.. Her engagement to Mr. Egleston was announced on Valentine's Day, 1915. [2]
